DOC.brief_summary: This open-label, multicenter study is designed to investigate the clinical utility and safety of pramlintide treatment in subjects with type 1 and type 2 diabetes who are failing to achieve the desired level of glycemic control using insulin therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Utility and Safety of Pramlintide in Subjects With Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: The subject has a clinical diagnosis of type 1 diabetes mellitus requiring treatment with insulin for a minimum of 6 months at Screening; OR The subject has a clinical diagnosis of type 2 diabetes requiring treatment with insulin with or without oral antidiabetic agents for a minimum of 6 months at Screening. The subject has a HbA1c of 7.0% to 11.0% at Screening.
